@zachleat @photomatt @jamstackconf @eleven_ty 100% agreed. It’s a misconception that you *must* throw the JavaScript kitchen sink at Jamstack. You could choose to do that with sites built on any platform or architecture, but that usually means you’re holding it wrong. (And @eleven_ty helps you hold it right)
